name: DialysisProcedureExclusionHDHCPCS
title: Dialysis Procedure Exclusion HD HCPCS
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Dialysis Procedure Exclusion.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Dialysis Procedure Exclusion for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath),(Data Element Scope: Dialysis Procedure Exclusion care need for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Dialysis Procedure Exclusion HCPCS Codes that constitute the Diabetic Kidney care need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Unscheduled or emergency dialysis treatment for an esrd patient in a hospital outpatient department that is not certified as an esrd facility

Home therapy; peritoneal dialysis, administrative services, professional pharmacy services, care coordination and all necessary supplies and equipment (drugs and nursing visits coded separately), per diem
